title: My Offering

tokens.lyric: Now I have to come to know, I've truly come to know,

lines.raw: [C]Now I have to come to know, I've truly come to know,
[D]For your altar [A]stands and waits for an [D]offering never made.
[G]He cries through [D]all the ages for [G]still no offering [A]comes, [D]
[G]Our Father [D]cries in loneliness for [A7]He cannot share His [D]heart.

tokens.lyric: Now I have come to know, I've truly come to know,

lines.raw: Now I have come to know, I've truly come to know,

tokens.lyric: Father, now I know your blessed grace;

lines.raw: Father, now I know your blessed grace;

tokens.lyric: For you raised me from the darkness and gave to me new life.

lines.raw: For you raised me from the darkness and gave to me new life.

tokens.lyric: I live and stand before you, but now you cry again.

lines.raw: I live and stand before you, but now you cry again.

tokens.lyric: My Father has to say to me,

lines.raw: My Father has to say to me,

tokens.lyric: "Go and die now in my place."

lines.raw: "Go and die now in my place."

tokens.lyric: Now pledging I will go, determined I will go,

lines.raw: Now pledging I will go, determined I will go,

tokens.lyric: Father, now I'm changing to Your way,

lines.raw: Father, now I'm changing to Your way,

tokens.lyric: For no other will I follow, but go my Father's way

lines.raw: For no other will I follow, but go my Father's way

tokens.lyric: Upon Your waiting altar I kneel without a word.

lines.raw: Upon Your waiting altar I kneel without a word.

tokens.lyric: My life shall be the sacrifice;

lines.raw: My life shall be the sacrifice;
